item.title: Starting a homepage
item.description: Using hugo, a static stie generation framework together with the theme Introduction, I got this awesome site, for providing contact details and showing of my latest projects as well as experiences. blabla

item.title: Long Form Writing and Quotes
item.description: Prolific writes rejoice! Introduction beautifully renders long pages of writing and blocks of quoted text. Let the ipsum show you how.
